name: Stop the Fire!
description:
This is our first game jam, team of 2! - For the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

It's a game where you have to stop the fire from spreading to the houses by building walls. But the more walls you place the harder it is to rotate them to accurately place them!

How to play:

There is a how to play page in the main menu but we'll say it here anyway.

Place walls to stop the fire 
from reaching the target.

Click to place a wall - there is a cooldown 
between each placement.
Rotate the wall with A and D.
Change the size of the wall with W and S.
Placing a wall over another will bounce push the wall slightly away.
You can only place walls near the fire and cannot place them close to the target.
Survive until the timer runs out.

There are pre placed walls at the start to help.

GOOD LUCK!
